entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
